bill.title: Elected statewide and district officials; increase salaries.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-3-31, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salary Of The Governor, Effective January 1, 2016, To An Amount Equal To Fifty Percent Of The Salary Of The President Of The United States, And To Increase The Salaries Of The Elected Statewide And District Officers; To Amend Section 5-1-43, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Salary Of The Lieutenant Governor, Effective January 1, 2016; To Amend Section 5-1-41, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Compensation Paid To Members Of The Senate And House Of Representatives, Effective January 1, 2016; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Fees and Salaries of Public Officers;Appropriations
